|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [mapType(type)](./sdk-core.typemapper.maptype.md) |  | Maps a "raw type" object to a "known (specific) type" object. In the process, it also learns the new type. Can only map types if their dependencies were previously learned (through mapping). |
